org.apache.river.qa.harness

Class ClassServerAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.AbstractServiceAdmin
      • org.apache.river.qa.harness.ClassServerAdmin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Admin

    public class ClassServerAdmin
extends AbstractServiceAdmin
implements Admin
    A specialization of AbstractServiceAdmin which manages an HTTP class server. The class server runs in the same VM as its admin.

    This admin implementation supports the following well-known service properties:

    type the mandatory service type, "classServer"
    impl the mandatory name of the class to instantiate. Assumptions built into this admin require that the value of the parameter must be "org.apache.river.tool.ClassServer"
    port the TCP port the server is to use, default is 8080
    dir the document directory the server is to use. The default is the value of the configuration property org.apache.river.jsk.home appended with "/lib"
    serverjvmopts options which may be passed to the server. Supported values include -trees and -verbose
    The proxy returned by getProxy is a local reference to an instance of the class server. This admin cannot start a class server in a separate VM.

        Starts the class server.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Admin
        Throws:

        RemoteException - never.
